ISSUE.TITLE: Select country label are display twice in order edit address admin side
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Admin > Edit Order 2. Click on Edit address 3. Select country , in that it display 2 times select country https://prnt.sc/103mwre

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5368 Prevented to display "Select state" item if only one item is exists
